artist: Artist: Mariette Lydis; Author: John Gay; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: Marius Audin Press, Lyon, France , (text); Printer: Mourlot Freres, Paris , (prints)

description: binding: blue buckram, blind and gold-stamped; endpapers: Rives gray wove; slip case: beige textured paper over cardboard, lettering and design stamped in back; deckle-edged, two; type: Inkunabula; 180 pp.
title: The Beggar's Opera
